dialogue.name: showbackgroundimage
dialogue.string: festivalbeginning

dialogue.name: mc
dialogue.string: "So, you two must be the other members that Monika and the other girls keep mentioning."

dialogue.name: mc
dialogue.string: "They seem to know you quite well, even though I haven't seen either of you at a club meeting before."

dialogue.name: mc
dialogue.string: "Well, I guess I did get roped into this whole Literature Club thing not too long ago, must've missed when you were around."

dialogue.name: mc
dialogue.string: "I'm glad you showed up today though. Your whole singing thing has had the club really inspired."

dialogue.name: mc
dialogue.string: "For the school festival later today, they decided to sing live as their club's special activity."

dialogue.name: mc
dialogue.string: "Not sure what singing has to do with literature, but everyone seemed on board. Can't be upset at it, though."

dialogue.name: mc
dialogue.string: "I haven't seen Sayori this happy in a while."

dialogue.name: mc
dialogue.string: "I haven't had to go out of my way to wake her up for school nearly as much as I do, she's right outside with a happy smile waiting for me, humming happy tunes."

dialogue.name: mc
dialogue.string: "But if you guys didn't show up, I would've had to be the one to sing with them. I'm not ready to embarrass myself in front of my peers like that yet."

dialogue.name: mc
dialogue.string: "Plus, none of them could even figure out a song they wanted to duet."

dialogue.name: mc
dialogue.string: "You think you guys can help them out?"

dialogue.name: gf
dialogue.string: *happy gesture*

dialogue.name: bf
dialogue.string: "Beep!"

dialogue.name: mc
dialogue.string: "A whole backlog of songs? That should give them all a nice selection to choose from."

dialogue.name: mc
dialogue.string: "I'll let them know once they come back from prepping."

dialogue.name: mc
dialogue.string: "And I'll see you two tonight at the festival."

dialogue.name: fadein
dialogue.string: hidedialogue

dialogue.name: mc
dialogue.string: "Audio is all set up, we're ready to go when you are."

dialogue.name: sayori
dialogue.string: "Thank you so much for helping us!"

dialogue.name: natsuki
dialogue.string: "It's funny seeing you managing all that music tech."

dialogue.name: sayori
dialogue.string: "Yeah! You're like our own personal MC!"

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: (In more ways than one, ahaha-)

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: (Hmm... I wonder if that joke works in translation-)

dialogue.name: natsuki
dialogue.string: "Oh, you're gonna go first, Yuri?"

dialogue.name: yuri
dialogue.string: "I found myself particularly immersed in the story of the track I picked."

dialogue.name: yuri
dialogue.string: "A song of two young lovers who wander into the shady parts of their lively hometown and come face to face with a monster."

dialogue.name: yuri
dialogue.string: "One ready to exact the will of God upon them."

dialogue.name: yuri
dialogue.string: "With a chainsaw."
